channel.title: Home on Erika Balsom
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Erika Balsom

item.title: Home
item.description:
Erika Balsom is a scholar and critic based in London, working on cinema, art, and their intersection. She is Reader in Film and Media Studies at King’s College London and holds a PhD in Modern Culture and Media from Brown University.

Email: erika.balsom at kcl.ac.uk
